body_html:
The two authors / maintainers of this experimental feature no longer work on TensorFlow, as far as I know, and partial_run functionality is probably better solved by using Eager Execution.

I'd love to leave this open for community contributions to fix this, but my guess is that no one will ever get to this, and everyone is better off moving to Eager, which is supposed to be the default mode in TF 2.0 anyway and will be supported much better.

body:
The two authors / maintainers of this experimental feature no longer work on TensorFlow, as far as I know, and partial_run functionality is probably better solved by using Eager Execution.

I'd love to leave this open for community contributions to fix this, but my guess is that no one will ever get to this, and everyone is better off moving to Eager, which is supposed to be the default mode in TF 2.0 anyway and will be supported much better.
